price: (Kae) εberε a Yεka kyεrεε Soro abͻfoͻ no sε: “Mommrε mo ho ase mfa mo anim mmutu fͻm mma Adam, wɔde wͻn anim butuu fͻm (maa Adam), gyesε Iblis, wannyε.
arabic: وَإِذۡ قُلۡنَا لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسۡجُدُواْ لِأٓدَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓاْ إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-idh qul'nā lil'malāikati us'judū liādama fasajadū illā ib'līsa abā
